summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of Lot 3, and the northwesterly 20 feet of Lot 6, in Block 11, as laid out on the claims of C.D. Boren and A.A. Denny, except the part taken for 3rd Avenue, to be used as a site for a sub-station for the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System, and specifying the terms of conditions thereof.
